You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesZ Z] > &zacute;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Zacute;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0179/index.htm U+00179].
  * `&zacute;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/017a/index.htm U+0017A].
